posts.name: Yash Aggarwal
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.68.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • This version contains a number of small tweaks and bug fixes to keep Signal running smoothly.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.67.0-beta.1…v7.68.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

New Version: 7.68.0-beta.1

55 new commits since 7.67.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.68.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Fix self badge retrieval [2]

  • Update pino to 9.8.0 [3]

  • Update electron to 37.2.6 [4]

  • Faster CI runs [5]

  • Fix calls tab mark read error when adhoc call is the latest [6]

  • Update @signalapp/sqlcipher to 2.2.2 [7]

  • Add support for call link epochs [8]

  • Filter out SMS conversations with no messages from the contact results [9]

  • Use larger windows runner in CI [10]

  • Fix benchmark name [11]

  • Fix quote annotation for GIFs [12]

  • Fix backup thumbnail encryption when downloading [13]

  • Remove unused capabilities [14]

  • Fix check in wasGroupCallRingPreviouslyCanceled [15]

  • getConversation: first/familyName should use nickname if set [16]

  • Revert react-virtualized key changes [17]

  • Key ConversationList by mode in left pane [18]

  • Fix image thumbnail cover size [19]

  • Upgrade libsignal to v0.78.2 [20]

  • Use ErrorBoundary for donations [21]

  • Treat 403 from CDN0 the same as a 404 from others CDNs [22]

  • Linux builds: Use ubuntu 22 image [23]

  • Add license-comments eslint rule [24]

  • Remove backbone as a dependency [25]

  • Get Tailwind ready for general usage [26]

  • Add setting for "keep muted chats archived" [27]

  • ConversationController: Listen for updates and update unread count [28]

  • Add in progress donation placeholder badge to donations home [29]

  • Post Donate Badge Toggle Modal [30]

  • Fix attachment key in AttachmentList [31]

  • Use fully qualified keys in ConversationList [32]

  • Release notes fetcher test flake fix [33]

  • Add existence check to addStickerPackReference [34]

  • Upgrade mock-server to v13.2.2 [35]

  • Begin Donations testing [36]

  • Release notes for 7.67 [37]

  • Update strings [38]

  • Update DNS fallback [39]

  • Disable background throttling [40]

  • Fix linux build file permissions to fix reproducible builds [41]

  • Donations: Fix x and download buttons not working on receipt modal [42]

  • Fix sleep() during background throttling [43]

  • Simplify interaction with updater and main process [44]

  • Update electron to 37.3.1 [45]

  • Update retry behavior for backed-up attachments [46]

  • Fix donation receipts list noMouseClose [47]

  • Donations flow visual fixes [48]

  • Add support for OutgoingMessageDetails.dateReceived [49]

  • Update behavior on timeout retrieving archive [50]

  • Upgrade libsignal to v0.78.3 and add chat noise shadowing [51]

  • Wait to confirm keys sync message [52]

  • release notes [53]

  • Update strings [54]

  • 7.68.0-beta.1 [55]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.67.0-beta.1…v7.68.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).
